line: all that stuff about rachel you don’t feel that now
you are as your friend tony would say grrrreat
i just had the most amazing bath
wait you like them with me
honey it’s not the bath i enjoy it’s the wet naked lady
you just sit in there stewing in your own filth
how dirty do you think i am
i’m telling you if you had some candles and some bubbles and some music you would love it
it would take all of your stress away
honey it’s 2 00 on a wednesday and i’m watching road rules how stressed do you think i am
hey chandler you got a minute
i i really need to talk to you
is this a cold pizza talk or a leftover meatloaf talk
it’s it’s just lately i’ve been feeling okay here’s what it is you know what
i feel a lot better thanks
oh no no no you don’t just come back
you and monica friends for a long time and sure there are rules but then you went to london
i mean there are rules there too
it was different for you guys
i mean i mean you were both in the same place right
when monica and i were in london we were both in london
forget it and listen do me a favor this conversation was between you and me
oh ross don’t forget we have that doctor’s appointment tomorrow
hey are you going to find out the s x of the baby
no no we talked about it
all we care about is that it’s happy and healthy
are you two talking about the same baby
have you started off thinking of names yet
i’ve come up with a bunch of ideas
if it’s a girl phoebe and if it’s a boy phoebo
but it wouldn’t hurt to have a backup you know
uh rach rach what were you thinking
i was thinking if it’s a girl how about sandrine
that’s a really pretty name for for an industrial solvent
okay fine what do you have
well ok it’s for a boy
well i know it’s a little out there but darwin
wow oh my god our child will be beaten to death in the schoolyard
you’re just saying that because i said no to your name
how how about you each get five vetoes
i don’t think you’re going to need it though
i have my own kiln and my dress is made out of wheat
i bought homemade soap from her at a dead show
okay how about for a guy thatcher
ross why do you hate our child
but only if it’s a girl
how about ooh i like ruth
are we having an 89 year old
is it me or is veto starting to sound really good
boy do i have a surprise for you
no but someone’s really not going to get over that idea are they
could you draw me a picture of us having s x on the balcony
please could you just try it for me
come on i used all my best stuff
i i i lit some candles
i used bath salts plus bubble bath
and got you this little plastic navy ship
well this does butch it up a bit
i swear if you try it you will love it
all right if i do this can we at least discuss s x on the balcony
bet i know how that discussion’s going to go
all right this isn’t so bad
which is okay because i’ve got my boat
i told you you were a bath person
hey when you get out maybe i can give you a facial
i’m going to need a bigger boat
i don’t think you had an open mind about the name ruth
i mean come on little ruthie geller how how cute is that
i can practically hear the mahjong tiles
now are you two interested in knowing the s x of the baby
but you have it right there in that file
you could tell us whether it’s a boy or a girl
but if you don’t want to know
no no we want to wait right
and uh i know it’s really not my place but please don’t name your child phoebo
so which of these babies do you think is the ugliest
yeah why is it staring at me
i think it knows i’m talking about it
don’t don’t you wh wha hey
but i didn’t see anything i swear
okay but ross just listen to me
but i couldn’t even if i wanted to because i don’t know
i swear i didn’t see anything and i don’t want to know
it was just a momentary lapse
don’t don’t you have any self control
okay a couple months late on the lecture ross
i’m in the bathroom can you come in here
i i think i’ll wait out here
i drew my own bath but i did it wrong
the salt didn’t dissolve and is now lodged places
and the scents i used don’t compliment each other
okay let’s talk about something else
so what was going on with you today
well i actually had the weirdest conversation with joey
he was talking about rules and right and wrong and
i had the exact same conversation
joey hasn’t had this much trouble getting out words since we saw him in macbeth
all right let’s break this down
what exactly did he say to you
okay he was talking about rules
umm and looking at people differently
he didn’t say anything about that to me
he was asking all these questions about you me and london
and of course the glue that holds this all together the rules
maybe he wants to do what you and i did in london with someone
but what did he mean by rules
he stopped talking the minute phoebe came in
because he was looking at her differently
and phoebe is his friend so he thinks that would be breaking the rules
he wants to do it with phoebe in london
that two of our best friends could start the greatest love affair of their lives
and they would have me to thank and we could all start having babies
i’m not going to let you say anything
oh hey monica i brought back your iron
i got a new one like a month ago
oh just as well i broke this one
i mean i i i really shouldn’t say
i mean i’m really not supposed to
then it’s really too bad that you can’t tell me
well then tell him to stop staring
is it something you’d be interested in
i don’t know i don’t know i don’t know
you know i mean on the one hand mother may i
but y’know on the other hand no
i don’t want to risk what we have
so you think you’re going to talk to him
i don’t want him to get hurt
well i must say i am on fire
i’m really coming around on the name ruth
i think i would actually consider naming our child that
rach i i can’t tell you how how much that means to me
you you hated the name ruth
why why would you change your mind
unless you know we’re never going to have to use it
i actually changed my mind about the name
you’re just giving me ruth so you’ll get to name it when it’s a boy and that’s when you’ll swoop in and name him heath or blaine or sequoia
unless you anticipated that i would figure all this out and you know that it actually is a girl and you really do want her to be named ruth
well i’m not falling for that
but ross you want the name ruth
i i know things worked out for chandler and monica but that’s very rare
and this is so much more complicated than it was for those guys
i mean it’s rachel for god sakes
and she’s not only my friend she’s my pregnant friend
she’s my pregnant friend who’s ross’ ex
beat me over the head with it
what am i going to do
you know and i keep i keep trying to get rid of these feelings y’know
i stayed up all last night and made a list of everything i don’t like about her
she made me switch to light mayo
it tastes the same and my pants fit better
joey i just think you’re getting worked up over nothing
this is probably just a crush
y’know you get this rush of feelings but then it goes away
i’m joey i don’t get deep feelings
i know i’ve had them for all you guys
well except for ross and chandler
and i’m sure you’ve had them for us
so i uh i called the doctor and now we both know the s x of the baby
the student has become the master
ross i swear i don’t know
oh come on you know it’s a girl
sometimes i can’t believe it’s with you but still
i’m putting ruth back on the table
we’ll have ourselves a little baby ruth
yeah i’m going to take a bath
i’m just going to get a magazine
what do you think you’re doing
i know that you’re new at this but this is completely unacceptable bath decorum
oh it’s so hard to care when you’re this relaxed
fine you can have the bath but i am taking your boat
now you’re just a girl in a tub
well i just thought i would drop by and let you know how it went with joey
she pulled it out of me
well you were wrong he doesn’t like me
how would you like it if i sent you to lee majors’ house and told you that he liked you and you went down there and you found out that he didn’t like you
because it’s a relaxing and enjoyable time
what are you guys doing in here
a friend he’s looking at differently but it’s wrong
phoebe and i talked about it
dude you gotta rearrange your bubbles
ross and i were looking for you
what are we all doing in here
honey cover it up with the boat
yes we’re all in here and we would love for you to join us
hey did you did you tell them
no i was waiting for you
it’s a new day and it’s just a crush that’s all
all that worrying i was doing that was crazy
like my friend here the bird would say it was cuckoo
it sure is nice to do this together isn’t it
and what you’re doing feels so good
whatever keeps you off the balcony big guy
